card_text: (This card is always treated as a "Frightfur" card.)$NTarget 1 DARK monster you control Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; for the rest of this turn, you cannot declare attacks except with that monster, also each time that monster destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY, it can attack again in a row. If you control a Fairy monster, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 4 or lower DARK monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Toy Parade" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
